sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { userReducer } from '../redux/reducer/user/userReducer'; function Register() { const [name, setName] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const dispatch = useDispatch() const formSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(userReducer(name, email, password)) setName() setEmail() setPassword() } return (
Name setName(e.target.value)} /> Mail ID setEmail(e.target.value)} /> Password setPassword(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Register
